result.title: Invitation to CodeBuddy
result.content:
Hi All,

I would like to introduce CodeBuddy, which is a coding platform for beginners.

CodeBuddy is an educational initiative by students of IIIT Allahabad which provides an online platform where programmers can improve their skills by learning, practicing and competing. CodeBuddy contains blogs explaining various important concepts and also provides topic wise problems which will come handy to a programmer after he/she is done with the learning part. Currently, our platform contains blogs and problems for beginners, but we will keep on adding more blogs on regular basis.

Stay tuned on our page in order to get updates on new blogs, problems and contests. Your feedback and suggestions are most welcome.

Link to our website :- http://codebuddy.co.in

Follow us on Facebook :- https://www.facebook.com/CodeBuddyOfficial
